name: Meow Adventure
description: Game Meow Adventure is an Adventure  genre Platformer game. This game uses a side scroller mode. This game is fun to play with some challenging game parts. This game has several levels of play. This game has an interesting gameplay. The story of this game is a cat who is looking for his friend who was kidnapped by an enemy giant. In his adventure there will be obstacles that must be overcome. Obstacles and enemies must be defeated to win this game. This game is fun to play because it is easy to play by children to adults.
